messages.mattermostDisabled: Mattermost chat is disabled for this user. Ensure that the user has enabled Mattermost sync and that the Mattermost integration is configured in the system administration.
messages.mattermostRequiresEmail: Mattermost sync requires you to fill in your email address.
messages.mattermostRequiresFirstName: Mattermost sync requires you to fill in your first name.
messages.mattermostRequiresPassword: Mattermost sync requires you to fill in your password when creating a new user.
